title: Spring Seasonal Reset: TCM Tips for Renewal
excerpt: Support your Liver and energy in spring with food, movement, and acupuncture.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
In TCM, spring is associated with the Liver and new growth. This is a great time to reset habits and support detox pathways.

## Simple Spring Practices

- Eat more green, lightly cooked foods
- Add gentle stretching and walks
- Reduce alcohol and heavy meals
